0.html: We are interested in how well you can use online maps. The next five questions will ask you to locate places in East London, please locate them as best as you can. You can use your knowledge of the places, or the Google Maps search box to help you find the places.

1.html: Can you locate your school using a pushpin?

2.html: Can you locate the London Olympic Stadium using a pushpin?

0.html: In this question we will ask you to locate your home on the map. Remember that we will keep this information private, and only the research team will see it. We will not share it with anyone else. This information is really useful for our work, but if you really do not want to give it to us, then consider locating your postcode or your street instead, if you feel more comfortable.

1.html: Can you locate your home, or the home you live in most of the time, using a pushpin?

0.html: These next two questions will ask you to draw an area that covers your neighbourhood. The first question is about the neighbourhood where you live now, and the second is about the neighbourhood where you go to school.

1.html: Could you draw an area that covers your home neighbourhood where you live now?

2.html: Please could you draw an area that covers the neighbourhood that you use around your school?

0.html: We are interested in the places you go regularly as part of your day-to-day life. If you spend time in any of the following places please mark them on the map as best as you can. Sometimes the answers to different questions might be the same place; it is ok to give the same answer more than once if it is correct. If you regularly use more than one of any place, please add these additional places.

1.html: Please could you locate a newsagent/convenience store that you use regularly?

2.html: Please could you locate a fast-food shop, or takeaway, that you use regularly?

3.html: Please could you locate a place where you like to hang out/spend time with your friends?

4.html: Please could you locate a youth club that you might attend?

5.html: Please could you locate a sports or exercise club you might attend outside of school?

6.html: Please could you locate an after-school activity that you might attend (non-sporting)?

7.html: Please could you locate a friend whom you visit regularly?

8.html: Please could you locate a park or green space that you visit regularly?
